name: Rathalos Blademaster

meta_ratings.clan_boss: 5/10 (UNM capable with HP Burn synergy, irresistible Decrease DEF, 100% DEF ignore vs bosses, 200% damage 5th skill, pairs with Counterattack for cycling)
meta_ratings.hydra: 5/10 (ABSOLUTE KILLER with HP Burn, +50% passive damage, 1M+ damage on 5th skill reported, 100% DEF ignore vs heads, irresistible Decrease DEF)
meta_ratings.dungeons: 4/10 (Dragon/FK/IG/Spider boss killer, A2 AOE wave clear, Savage set mandatory, 100% DEF ignore vs bosses, +30% ATK aura)
meta_ratings.doom_tower: 4/10 (Boss killer focus, irresistible Decrease DEF critical for bosses, HP Burn synergy for floors, 100% DEF ignore vs bosses)
meta_ratings.arena: 5/10 (Arena Offense nuker, one-shot potential with A2, Helmsmasher DEF ignore stacking, Inc C.DMG/SPD self buff, slower nuker needs booster)
meta_ratings.faction_wars: 4/10 (Banner Lords faction, boss killer with irresistible Decrease DEF, A2 AOE wave clear, 100% DEF ignore vs bosses, +30% ATK aura)

skills.name: Spirit Thrust
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns. If the target is a Boss, this debuff cannot be resisted.

effects.notes: Single-target ATK-scaling damage. Damage Multiplier: 3.2 ATK (high for Attack role). Books increase damage +20% total.
50% chance to place 60% Decrease DEF debuff for 2 turns (65% when booked). KEY MECHANIC: If target is a Boss, this debuff CANNOT BE RESISTED (bypasses accuracy check). Critical for boss fights.

skills.book_value: Medium priority. Damage +10% (2 books), Debuff chance +15% total (50% → 65%). A2 and A3 are higher priority.
skills.notes: KEY MECHANIC: Decrease DEF cannot be resisted against bosses. This bypasses the accuracy vs resist check entirely - only the 65% proc chance applies. Extremely valuable for Clan Boss, Hydra, Doom Tower bosses, dungeon bosses. Requires ACC for non-boss targets.

skills.name: Spirit Step Slash (Cooldown: 4 turns)
skills.description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Every second use of this skill in a Round will attack all enemies instead. Will also ignore 25% of the target’s DEF. If the target is a boss, will ignore 100% of the target’s DEF.
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +10%
Level 5: Cooldown -1
Damage Multiplier: 4 ATK

effects.stat: ATK|HP|DEF|MAX HP|ENEMY_MAX_HP|Turn Meter|NA|... (as needed, where NA is 'not applicable'. This allows schema validation. This value should not be null)
effects.duration: Duration of buff/debuff in turns (if applicable)
effects.notes: Describe scaling, conditions, or special logic. Use multiple objects for multi-component or conditional effects.

skills.book_value: Value to fully book ex faster cooldown, more damage or debuff chance, etc.
skills.notes: Additional notes (conditional effects, scaling, special interactions, etc.)

skills.name: Overhead Slash
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Before attacking, places a 30% [Increase C.DMG] buff and a 30% [Increase SPD] buff on this Champion for 2 turns.

effects.notes: Places 30% Increase C.DMG buff on self BEFORE attacking. Lasts 2 turns. Increases crit damage output significantly.
Places 30% Increase SPD buff on self BEFORE attacking. Lasts 2 turns. Enables faster skill cycling and passive stacking.
AOE ATK-scaling damage. Damage Multiplier: 4.1 ATK (highest multiplier in kit). Attacks after self-buffing. Books increase damage +20% total.

skills.book_value: HIGH priority. Damage +20% total, Cooldown -1 (4 → 3 turns). Cooldown reduction critical for maintaining buffs uptime and faster passive cycling.
skills.notes: SETUP SKILL. Buffs self before attacking: Inc C.DMG boosts damage output, Inc SPD enables faster cycling to 5th skill passive. Highest multiplier (4.1 ATK). Book to 3-turn cooldown for more frequent use and better buff uptime. Pairs with A2 for devastating rotations.

skills.name: Rathalos Mastery
skills.description: Inflicts 50% more damage against targets under [HP Burn] debuffs. Receives 25% less damage from enemies under [HP Burn] debuffs. Every fifth skill used by this Champion deals 200% more damage.

effects.notes: +50% damage vs targets under HP Burn debuff (passive, always active). Synergizes with HP Burn champions (Venus, Ignatius, Drexthar, etc.). Multiplicative damage boost.
-25% damage taken from enemies under HP Burn debuff (passive, always active). Defensive utility vs HP Burn enemies.

Every 5th skill deals 200% MORE damage (3x damage total). Counter: A1, A1, A2, A3, A1 (5th) = 3x damage. Synergizes with Counterattack buff, Ally Join Attacks, Relentless set, Retaliation set, Retribution mastery for faster cycling.

skills.notes: CORE MECHANIC. +50% vs HP Burn targets makes him devastating with HP Burn champions. 200% damage every 5th skill is HUGE - community reports 1M+ damage on 5th hit vs Hydra. Best cycling: Relentless set (extra turns, fastest) > Counterattack buff > Retaliation set > Retribution mastery. Pairs with Ally Join Attacks (Cardiel, Warlord, etc.) for more skill uses. Track skill count for optimal rotation.

forms.aura: Increases Ally ATK in Dungeons by 30%
forms.comments: Form-specific notes, edge cases, or user/community feedback.

stat_priorities: 4000+ ATK (high ATK scaling on all skills)
180+ SPD (cycle skills faster, not speed tuned)
150+ ACC (Decrease DEF vs non-boss targets, optional vs bosses due to irresistible)

stat_priority_recommendations.clan_boss: 100% C.RATE, 250+ C.DMG, 4000+ ATK, 171+ SPD (speed tune UNM), 150+ ACC (optional due to irresistible Decrease DEF). Pair with HP Burn and Decrease DEF champions.
stat_priority_recommendations.hydra: 100% C.RATE, 300+ C.DMG, 4500+ ATK, 180+ SPD, 200+ ACC. Pair with HP Burn for +50% passive damage. Track skill count for 5th hit nuke (200% damage).
stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: 100% C.RATE, 250+ C.DMG, 4000+ ATK, 180+ SPD, 150+ ACC. Savage set mandatory for DEF ignore stacking (25% + 100% vs bosses = devastating).
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: 100% C.RATE, 300+ C.DMG, 5000+ ATK, 200+ SPD (slower nuker, needs booster), Helmsmasher for DEF ignore stacking. One-shot potential with A2.
stat_priority_recommendations.doom_tower: 100% C.RATE, 250+ C.DMG, 4000+ ATK, 180+ SPD, 200+ ACC. Irresistible Decrease DEF critical for bosses. Pair with HP Burn for floors.
stat_priority_recommendations.faction_wars: 100% C.RATE, 250+ C.DMG, 4000+ ATK, 180+ SPD, 150+ ACC. Banner Lords faction. Wave clear with A2 AOE, boss killer with A1 irresistible.

recommended_gear: Savage + Cruel/Fatal/Lethal (late game, boss killer focus: 25% DEF ignore from Savage + 100% from A2 vs bosses = devastating, Cruel for C.DMG boost)
Lifesteal + Speed (early/mid, farmer build: solo sustain for Campaign Brutal 12-3, Minotaur farming)
Relentless + Cruel (skill cycling focus: extra turns for faster 5th skill passive, best for passive cycling per community)
Retaliation + Cruel (counterattack build: cycle to 5th skill faster, but slower than Relentless)
Stats: Gloves C.DMG, Chest ATK%, Boots SPD, all with C.RATE/C.DMG/ATK%/SPD substats

clan_boss: WARMASTER T6 (high multipliers = strong Warmaster procs)
Offense tree: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, Life Drinker, Bring it Down, Cycle of Violence (skill cycling), Methodical, Kill Streak (skill cycling), Warmaster
Defense tree: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Resurgent, Delay Death, Retribution (counterattacks for 5th skill cycling)
hydra: Same as Clan Boss: Cycle of Violence + Kill Streak for skill cycling, Retribution for counterattacks
arena: HELMSMASHER T6 (DEF ignore stacking with Savage set and A2 for maximum penetration)
Offense tree: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Shield Breaker, Single Out, Ruthless Ambush, Cycle of Violence, Bring it Down, Kill Streak, Methodical, Helmsmasher
Defense tree: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Resurgent, Delay Death, Retribution
general: Cycle of Violence + Kill Streak for skill cycling to 5th passive faster
Retribution for counterattack cycling (pairs with Retaliation set or Counterattack buff)
Warmaster for PVE, Helmsmasher for PVP/Arena

blessings: Brimstone (Nuker, highest priority: +30% C.DMG, +15% C.RATE vs bosses)
Cruelty (Debuffer priority: +20% C.DMG, +10% damage vs debuffed, synergizes with Decrease DEF)
Crushing Rend (Damage Dealer: +10% DEF ignore, stacks with Savage/Helmsmasher/A2)
Phantom Touch (Damage Dealer: lifesteal on crit)
Soul Reap (Damage Dealer: heal on kill, for sustain)

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: AI uses skills appropriately. A2 alternates ST/AOE automatically (every 2nd use). No major issues reported.

cheese_strategy.cheese_type: DEF Ignore Stacking + HP Burn Synergy
cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: CHEESE BUILD: Savage set (25% DEF ignore) + A2 (100% DEF ignore vs bosses) + Helmsmasher mastery = massive DEF penetration. Pair with HP Burn champions (Venus, Ignatius, Drexthar, Mordecai) for +50% passive damage. Use Relentless set or Counterattack buff to cycle to 5th skill faster for 200% damage nuke (community reports 1M+ damage vs Hydra). Irresistible Decrease DEF guarantees debuff vs bosses (bypasses ACC check). Track skill count: A1, A1, A2, A3, A1 (5th) = 3x damage.

mechanics_advisory: LIMITED AVAILABILITY - Monster Hunter collaboration event (Jan 9 - Mar 5 2024), 7-day login reward, cannot be summoned from shards. Boss killer specialist with unique mechanics: (1) Irresistible Decrease DEF vs bosses (bypasses accuracy check, only 65% proc applies), (2) 100% DEF ignore on A2 vs bosses (devastating with Savage set stacking), (3) +50% damage vs HP Burn targets (pair with Venus/Ignatius/Drexthar), (4) 200% damage every 5th skill (community: '1M+ damage', 'absolute killer vs Hydra'). Best build: Savage + Cruel, 100% C.RATE, 250+ C.DMG, Warmaster/Helmsmasher, Brimstone blessing. Cycling: Relentless set > Counterattack buff > Retaliation set > Retribution mastery. Book priority: 10/10 - A2 and A3 HIGH priority for damage + cooldown reduction (4 → 3 turns). Pairs with: HP Burn champions (Venus, Ignatius), Counterattack (Skullcrusher, Valkyrie), Ally Join Attacks (Cardiel, Warlord), Decrease DEF (Stag Knight, Rhazin). Community consensus: underrated, best Monster Hunter champion.

validation_metadata.data_sources: fandom (stats table) + ayumilove (OCR, skills, masteries, gear, blessings, community feedback) + hellhades (ratings, strategy, meta positioning)

source_priority.stats: fandom (base table), 7/8 stats validated (ACC inferred as 0 standard for Attack)

source_priority.info: fandom + ayumilove (faction Banner Lords, affinity Force, role Attack, Monster Hunter collaboration Jan-Mar 2024)

validation_metadata.ocr_notes: 7/8 stats validated. ACC inferred as 0 (standard for Attack role, Decrease DEF requires ACC vs non-bosses but is irresistible vs bosses). stat_confidence 90 due to missing ACC stat.

author: GitHub Copilot
comments: LIMITED AVAILABILITY Monster Hunter collaboration champion (Jan-Mar 2024 event-exclusive). Boss killer specialist rated 5/5 CB, 5/5 Hydra, 5/5 Arena by HellHades. Community-rated far higher than you'd expect - 'absolute killer vs Hydra with HP burn', '1M+ damage on 5th skill', 'underrated', 'best Monster Hunter champ'. Unique irresistible Decrease DEF mechanic (bypasses accuracy vs bosses). Book priority 10/10 - must book A2 and A3 for cooldown reduction. Savage set mandatory for late game.

update_notes.last_patch: Entry created 2025-10-27 using optimized workflow (parallel fetch, atomic skill operations, batch comprehensive update). Monster Hunter collaboration event Jan-Mar 2024. No known champion nerfs/buffs since release.
